info.name: InoReader by Information Results Corporation
info.description:
This is a work in progress, focused on adjusting some elements - particularly the dashboard - to beautify the presentation and introduce some consistency in margins, padding, colors and the like.

Your comments are welcomed!
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.0 3/22/14
- initial version

Version 1.1 3/23/14 
- more tweaks!  dashboard, margins, padding, headers, backgrounds
- hiding the "notifications" button (which can easily get accidentally triggered when navigating the Preferences menu)
- now works with beta site too

Version 1.2 5/26/14 
- tweaking of gadget headers
- adjusted padding and alignment
- made gadgets more colorful and consistent
